Token.Abstract: Each of these delegate methods will also perform a notification post with the sender (CNSplitView instance) as notification object and a userInfo dictionary (except toolbarAttachedSubviewIndex:. The userInfo dictionary contains two elements that are accessible by these constants:
Asks the delegate about the index of the subview where the toolbar is attached to.
Informs the delegate that the splitview will show the specified toolbar on the given edge.

Parameter.Name: theSplitView
Parameter.Abstract: The splitview that sends the message.

Parameter.Name: theToolbar
Parameter.Abstract: The toolbar that will be visible.

Parameter.Name: theEdge
Parameter.Abstract: The edge the toolbar is attached to.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the splitview did show the specified toolbar on the given edge.

Parameter.Name: theSplitView
Parameter.Abstract: The splitview that sends the message.

Parameter.Name: theToolbar
Parameter.Abstract: The toolbar that is now visible.

Parameter.Name: theEdge
Parameter.Abstract: The edge the toolbar is attached to.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the splitview will hide the specified toolbar on the given edge.

Parameter.Name: theSplitView
Parameter.Abstract: The splitview that sends the message.

Parameter.Name: theToolbar
Parameter.Abstract: The toolbar that will be hidden.

Parameter.Name: theEdge
Parameter.Abstract: The edge the toolbar is attached to.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the splitview did hide the specified toolbar on the given edge.

Parameter.Name: theSplitView
Parameter.Abstract: The splitview that sends the message.

Parameter.Name: theToolbar
Parameter.Abstract: The toolbar that is now hidden.

Parameter.Name: theEdge
Parameter.Abstract: The edge the toolbar is attached to.
